mosinstall.name: EZ Realty
mosinstall.author: Kathy Strickland (aka PixelBunyiP)
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2006-2007 K.J. Strickland, Raptor Developments Pty Ltd T/as Raptor Services. Commercial copyright conditions.

queries.query: CREATE TABLE `#__ezrealty` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `type` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `cid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `locid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `stid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `cnid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `agent_id` varchar (30) NOT NULL default '', `mls_id` varchar (30) NOT NULL default '', `viewad` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `viewbooking` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `bookinglink` varchar (20) NOT NULL default '', `unit_num` varchar (20) NOT NULL default '', `street_num` varchar (10) NOT NULL default '', `address2` varchar (255) NOT NULL default '', `postcode` varchar (10) NOT NULL default '', `county` varchar (50) NOT NULL default '', `price` decimal(15,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `showprice` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `freq` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `bond` decimal(15,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `priceview` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `age` varchar(20) NOT NULL default '', `landtype` varchar (50) NOT NULL default '', `frontage` varchar (30) NOT NULL default '', `depth` varchar (30) NOT NULL default '', `bedrooms` varchar (5) NOT NULL default '', `totalrooms` varchar (5) NOT NULL default '', `livingarea` varchar (30) NOT NULL default '', `bathrooms` varchar (5) NOT NULL default '', `parking` varchar (5) NOT NULL default '', `mapref` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `declat` varchar (20) NOT NULL default '', `declong` varchar (20) NOT NULL default '', `vtour` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `com_feature` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `adline` varchar (255) NOT NULL default '', `propdesc` mediumtext NOT NULL default '', `smalldesc` varchar (255) NOT NULL default '', `image1` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `image2` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `image3` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `image4` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `image5` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `image6` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `image7` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `image8` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `image9` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `image10` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `image11` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `image12` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `ctown` varchar(150) NOT NULL default '', `ctport` varchar(150) NOT NULL default '', `schooldist` varchar(60) NOT NULL default '', `preschool` varchar(60) NOT NULL default '', `primaryschool` varchar(60) NOT NULL default '', `highschool` varchar(60) NOT NULL default '', `university` varchar(60) NOT NULL default '', `hofees` VARCHAR ( 10 ) NOT NULL default '', `custom1` varchar(50) NOT NULL default '', `custom2` varchar(50) NOT NULL default '', `custom3` varchar(50) NOT NULL default '', `custom4` varchar(50) NOT NULL default '', `custom5` varchar(50) NOT NULL default '', `pool` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `fplace` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `bbq` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `gazebo` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `lug` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `bir` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `heating` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `airco` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `shops` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `schools` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `elevator` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `pets` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `extra1` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `extra2` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `extra3` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `extra4` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `extra5` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `extra6` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `extra7` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `extra8` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `openhouse` tinyint( 1 ) DEFAULT '0', `ohouse_desc` text NOT NULL default '', `takings` varchar(30) default NULL, `returns` varchar(30) default NULL, `netprofit` varchar(30) default NULL, `bustype` varchar(30) default NULL, `bussubtype` varchar(30) default NULL, `stock` varchar(50) default NULL, `fixtures` varchar(50) default NULL, `fittings` varchar(50) default NULL, `squarefeet` varchar(50) default NULL, `percentoffice` varchar(50) default NULL, `percentwarehouse` varchar(50) default NULL, `loadingfac` varchar(50) default NULL, `fencing` varchar(50) default NULL, `rainfall` varchar(50) default NULL, `soiltype` varchar(50) default NULL, `grazing` varchar(50) default NULL, `cropping` varchar(50) default NULL, `irrigation` varchar(50) default NULL, `waterresources` varchar(100) default NULL, `carryingcap` varchar(50) default NULL, `storage` varchar(50) default NULL, `services` varchar(50) default NULL, `listdate` date NOT NULL default '0000-00-00', `lastupdate` varchar(20) default NULL, `expdate` varchar(20) default NULL, `hits` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `sold` varchar(50) NOT NULL default '', `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `editor` varchar(50) default NULL, `owner` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `premium` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `featured` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `metadesc` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `metakey` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE `#__ezrealty_leads` ( `lid` INT( 11 ) NOT NULL auto_increment, `status` INT( 3 ) NOT NULL default '0', `lead_name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `hphone` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `wphone` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `mobile` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `fax` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `email` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, `cid` INT(11) NOT NULL, `locid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `stid` INT(11) NOT NULL, `cnid` INT(11) NOT NULL, `ezcity` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `type` tinyint(3) NOT NULL default '0', `bedrooms` VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, `bathrooms` VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, `budget` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL default '', `source` VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL, `comments` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `notes` text NOT NULL default '', `date` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `checked_out` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL, `checked_out_time` DATETIME NOT NULL, `editor` VARCHAR(50), `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`lid`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE `#__ezrealty_profile` ( `prid` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `mid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `dealer_name` varchar(50) default NULL, `dealer_company` varchar(50) default NULL, `dealer_type` varchar(30) default NULL, `dealer_info` varchar(255) default NULL, `dealer_address1` varchar(50) default NULL, `dealer_address2` varchar(50) default NULL, `dealer_locality` varchar(50) default NULL, `dealer_pcode` varchar(10) default NULL, `dealer_state` varchar(50) default NULL, `dealer_country` varchar(50) default NULL, `show_addy` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `dealer_declat` varchar (20) NOT NULL default '', `dealer_declong` varchar (20) NOT NULL default '', `dealer_email` varchar(50) default NULL, `dealer_phone` varchar(20) default NULL, `dealer_fax` varchar(20) default NULL, `dealer_mobile` varchar(20) default NULL, `dealer_sms` varchar(20) default NULL, `show_sms` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `dealer_skype` varchar(30) default NULL, `dealer_ymsgr` varchar(30) default NULL, `dealer_icq` varchar(30) default NULL, `dealer_web` varchar(255) default NULL, `dealer_blog` varchar(255) default NULL, `dealer_image` varchar(70) default NULL, `logo_image` varchar(70) default NULL, `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `editor` varchar(50) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`prid`), UNIQUE KEY `mid` (`mid`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE `#__ezrealty_price` ( `pid` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `range` float(15,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `display` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `ordering` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `editor` varchar(50) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`pid`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE `#__ezrealty_locality` ( `locid` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `stateid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `ezcity` varchar (255) NOT NULL, `ezcity_desc` varchar (255) NOT NULL, `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `editor` varchar(50) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`locid`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE `#__ezrealty_state` ( `stid` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar (255) NOT NULL, `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `editor` varchar(50) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`stid`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE `#__ezrealty_country` ( `cnid` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar (255) NOT NULL, `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `editor` varchar(50) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cnid`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE `#__ezrealty_catg` ( `cid` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `image` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `access` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `ordering` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `editor` varchar(50) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cid`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE `#__ezrealty_room` ( `bid` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `number` varchar(5) NOT NULL default '', `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `ordering` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `editor` varchar(50) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bid`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE `#__ezrealty_lightbox` ( `llid` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `uid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `propid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `date` varchar(20) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`llid`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE `#__ezrealty_content` ( `contid` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL default '', `content` text NOT NULL default '', `checked_out` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `editor` varchar(50) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`contid`) ) ;

CREATE TABLE `#__ezrealty_mail` ( `mailid` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL default '', `email` varchar(70) NOT NULL default '', `confirmed` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `date` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', PRIMARY KEY (`mailid`) ) ;

INSERT INTO `#__ezrealty_content` ( `contid` , `title` , `content` , `checked_out` , `checked_out_time` , `editor` ) VALUES (1, 'Business Introduction', 'This is where your business introduction goes for the site.', 0, '0000-00-00 00:00:00', NULL);

INSERT INTO `#__ezrealty_content` ( `contid` , `title` , `content` , `checked_out` , `checked_out_time` , `editor` ) VALUES (2, 'Members Area Introduction', 'This is where you enter your members area introduction.', 0, '0000-00-00 00:00:00', NULL);

INSERT INTO `#__ezrealty_content` ( `contid` , `title` , `content` , `checked_out` , `checked_out_time` , `editor` ) VALUES (3, 'Terms of Listing', 'This is where your terms of listing goes.', 0, '0000-00-00 00:00:00', NULL);

INSERT INTO `#__ezrealty_content` ( `contid` , `title` , `content` , `checked_out` , `checked_out_time` , `editor` ) VALUES (4, 'Success Page', 'This is where your success page content goes. This is the page people land on after a successful payment.', 0, '0000-00-00 00:00:00', NULL);

INSERT INTO `#__ezrealty_content` ( `contid` , `title` , `content` , `checked_out` , `checked_out_time` , `editor` ) VALUES (5, 'Cancel Page', 'This is where your cancel page content goes. This is the page people land on after a cancelled or failed payment.', 0, '0000-00-00 00:00:00', NULL);

INSERT INTO `#__ezrealty_content` ( `contid` , `title` , `content` , `checked_out` , `checked_out_time` , `editor` ) VALUES (6, 'Admin Print Header Page', 'This is where the html for your print header goes.', 0, '0000-00-00 00:00:00', NULL);

INSERT INTO `#__ezrealty_content` ( `contid` , `title` , `content` , `checked_out` , `checked_out_time` , `editor` ) VALUES (7, 'Admin Print Footer Page', 'This is where the html for your print footer goes.', 0, '0000-00-00 00:00:00', NULL);
